Name: Desert of Doitjma
About the game: Desert of Doitjam is an adventure platformer about a young person, Murphy, that is sent by Doitjma to an alternate reality for a series of survival games. At the end, Murphy might face Doitjma itself and fight for his freedom. Well, but only if he can survive long enough. /features and content/ Desert of Doitjma is a adventure platform game. > Mystery and adventure feel; > Alternate reality survival game; > Progressively harder enemies and levels; > Character-driven story. Desert of Doitjma is a Spaceman's series spin-off.
